item.title: Micro:Bit Explained
item.description: This post explain what micro:bit has to offer. As soon as I saw a post with rust support for micro:bit I purchased it without any hesitation. So now lets see what this awesome development board has got. The board is slick with minimal design (according to me). If the pic looks overwhelming, relax, we are going to decode the components that matter the most as a developer. Application Processor Our code is executed in the application processor.
